name: pnp-export-teams-conversations
title: Export conversations from Microsoft Teams Channels
shortDescription: This script exports the conversations from Microsoft Teams Channels.
longDescription: This script uses CLI for Microsoft 365 to export the conversations from Microsoft Teams Channels. You don't need to be a tenant admin to export conversations but you still can only export conversations of Teams of which you are member.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
